The Old Way

The Modern Superstar
CRISPR-Cas9

// Precise Editing
find("Target Gene")
.edit("Mutation")

CRISPR-Cas9

Finds a specific sequence and makes an exact cut.

Precision Editing

Removes mutations like Sickle Cell.

Advantages

Fast. Cheap. Incredibly Accurate.

Gene Silencing
"Knockdown[" technology using RNA interference (RNAi)

allows scientists to find a specific sequence of DNA and make an exact cut We can use this to remove a mutation...
